data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Orellana, Ecuador to the gospel today.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Orellana, Ecuador

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Orellana.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: There are 136,400 people living in the state of Orellana. Only about 14,420 might be believers.
Father, may the churches in Orellana, Ecuador honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Father, help the 14,420 believers in Orellana to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Orellana, Ecuador need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.section_summary:
the state of Orellana, Ecuador has a population of 136,400.

We estimate Orellana has 14,420 people who might know Jesus, 113,380 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 8,601 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Orellana, Ecuador who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

location.name: Orellana
location.cities_list: Puerto Francisco de Orellana, Boca Suno, Pantoja
location.cities_list_w_pop: Puerto Francisco de Orellana (48,144), Boca Suno (20,313), Pantoja (564)
